Event: Drug Abuse Prevention, Treatment, and Rehabilitation
Description:
Under the Carter Administration, this amendment to the Drug Abuse Office and Treatment Act provided federal funding to various programs for the prevention of drug abuse and for the treatment and rehabilitation of drug abusers. In adopting these acts, Congress aimed to coordinate a national strategy and establish a framework of federal, state, and local partnerships to combat drug abuse.
